Package com.stripe.example

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReaderList.ReaderSelectionListener
    A simple listener interface that classes can implement to be notified of updates to the reader list.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackendSimulator
    The BackendSimulator has been included as part of the example app's client-side code for demonstration purposes only.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity is the starting activity for the example app.
    PaymentFragment
    The PaymentFragment is where the user can kick off the process of creating a charge on the connected reader.
    PaymentIntentActivity
    The PaymentIntentActivity shows the payment intent object that has been used for the most recent payment.
    ReaderFragment
    The ReaderFragment is where the user is able to connect and disconnect from readers.
    ReaderList
    The ReaderList is a simple class that will statically hold any readers that have been found.
    ReaderSelectionActivity
    The ReaderSelectionActivity shows the list of recognized readers and allows the user to select one to connect to.
    ReaderSelectionFragment
    The ReaderSelectionFragment shows the list of nearby readers and allows for one to be selected for connection.
    TerminalEventListener
    The TerminalEventListener implements the TerminalListener interface and will forward along any events to other parts of the app that register for updates.
    TerminalProvider
    The TerminalProvider will create a new Terminal instance the first time it's called but will then just return the existing instance for all future calls.
